thread.title: Con-way Chief Financial Officer To Address RBC Conference
thread.title_full: Con-way Chief Financial Officer To Address RBC Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Con-way Chief Financial Officer To Address RBC Conference
text:
Con-way Inc.
ANN ARBOR, Mich. , Sept. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Con-way Inc. (NYSE: CNW) announced today that executive vice-president and CFO, Stephen L. Bruffett will participate in a "fireside chat" on September 10 at the RBC Capital Markets Global Transportation Conference in Las Vegas . The presentation will begin at approximately 11:30 a.m. Pacific Daylight Time .
Parties may listen to the presentation via live Internet webcast. The webcast will be available at www.con-way.com in the investors section. Please go to Con-way's web site at least fifteen minutes early to register and install any necessary software. Following the live webcast, an Internet replay will also be available at the Con-way web site.
About Con-way Inc. -- Con-way Inc. (NYSE: CNW) is a $5.8 billion freight transportation and logistics services company headquartered in Ann Arbor, Mich. Con-way delivers industry-leading services through its primary operating companies of Con-way Freight, Con-way Truckload and Menlo Logistics. These operating units provide high-performance, day-definite less-than-truckload (LTL), full truckload and multimodal freight transportation, as well as logistics, warehousing and supply chain management services. Con-way also operates a trailer refurbishing and manufacturing company which supplies trailing equipment to the company's trucking fleets. Con-way Inc. and its subsidiaries operate from more than 500 locations across North America and in 20 countries. For more information about Con-way, visit www.con-way.com .
